BasicInfo.short: The only e-learning solution to offer video & micro learning for over 160 languages, mapped to international CEFR and ACTFL levels

Products.name: Langu.ag
Products.description: Free multi-language learning app with over 160 languages - for the culture vulture on the move

Products.name: Speaking Cultures
Products.description: Social learning language exchange platform, connecting like-minded language enthusiasts around the world to exchange cultures.

Products.name: Test Your Language
Products.description: Testing that speaks your language. TYL Quiz for social sharing and TYL Certificate for learners needing to prove their linguistic skills.

Products.name: The Material Exchange
Products.description: TME is the go-to Edhub for language educators and teachers, crowdsourcing digital “edsources” and knowledge to leverage time and skills.

Products.name: cudoo
Products.description: Unique video & micro-based online courses covering over 160 languages and cultural soft skills for both individuals and companies
